attributes.action: buy British with British tax money!
attributes.additional_details:
ALL purchases by HM government and its tax payer funded groups (police, army, local councils etc etc) must be made to buy ONLY British made goods. It is offensive to see the new 'British' police group showing a training video featuring an Audi, 3 BMW 4x4s and a Lexus. We have Range Rover and Jaguar - they may not be owned here but they invest and employ here.
Why should 35k of my money be spent on an Audi when 25k would buy a BRITISH made Jaguar? The people that make the Jaguar would not be on benefit and would be paying tax!!!! Common sense MUST prevail - buy BRITISH
